Package payrollObjects

Class Fulltime

java.lang.Object
payrollObjects.Employee
payrollObjects.Fulltime
Direct Known Subclasses:
Management
public class Fulltime
extends Employee
Extends the Employee class and includes specific data and operations to a full-time employee. Includes an annual salary for storing the amount an employee makes annually and a payroll for storing the amount an employee is to be paid during each payroll period.
Author:
Matthew Brandao, Armit Patel

  • Constructor Details

    • Fulltime

      public Fulltime​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String department, Date dateHired, double annualSalary)
      Creates an instance of Fulltime. A Fulltime employee is also an instance of Employee.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the employee
      department - department the employee belongs to
      dateHired - the date the employee was hired
      annualSalary - the annual salary of the employee

  • Method Details

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
      Compares the profiles of two full time employees.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Employee
      Returns:
      true if the full time employees share the same profile, false if the profiles are different or the parameter is not an instance of Fulltime

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Creates string representation of a full time employee's attributes with their annual salary. Fulltime's attributes also contains Employee's attributes.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Employee
      Returns:
      string representation of Employee and Fulltime

    • calculatePayment

      public void calculatePayment()
      Calculates the payment for a full time employee. The bi weekly pay period conversion for annual salary is handled by this function.
      Overrides:
      calculatePayment in class Employee

    • getAnnualSalary

      public double getAnnualSalary()
      Returns the salary a full time employee is to receive annually.
      Returns:
      the annualSalary

    • getPayroll

      public double getPayroll()
      Gets the amount a full time employee is to receive per payroll period.
      Returns:
      payroll the amount for payroll

    • setAnnualSalary

      public void setAnnualSalary​(double salary)
      Sets the salary a full time employee is to receive annually.
      Parameters:
      salary - the annual salary to set for the full time employee

    • setPayroll

      public void setPayroll​(double payroll)
      Sets the amount a full time employee is to receive during a payroll process
      Parameters:
      payroll - the amount to set
